Trump is speaking what is on his mind without decorating or "filtering"his words or promises which makes me feel comfortable voting for him and gives me the impression that he is honest.
(S (NP (NNP Trump)) (VP (VBZ is) (VP (VBG speaking) (SBAR (WHNP (WP what)) (S (VP (VBZ is) (PP (IN on) (NP (PRP$ his) (NN mind)))))) (PP (PP (IN without) (S (VP (VBG decorating) (CC or) (`` ") (PRP$ filtering"his) (NNS words) (CC or) (NNS promises)))) (SBAR (WHNP (WDT which)) (S (VP (VP (VBZ makes) (S (NP (PRP me)) (VP (VB feel) (ADJP (JJ comfortable)) (S (VP (VBG voting) (PP (IN for) (NP (PRP him)))))))) (CC and) (VP (VBZ gives) (NP (PRP me)) (NP (DT the) (NN impression) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBZ is) (ADJP (JJ honest))))))))))))) (. .))(
  (S
    (NP (NNP Trump))
    (VP
      (VBZ is)
      (VP
        (VBG speaking)
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WP what))
          (S (VP (VBZ is) (PP (IN on) (NP (PRP$ his) (NN mind)))))
)

        (PP
          (PP
            (IN without)
            (S
              (VP
                (VBG decorating)
                (CC or)
                (`` ")
                (PRP$ filtering"his)
                (NNS words)
                (CC or)
                (NNS promises)))
)
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WDT which))
            (S
              (VP
                (VP
                  (VBZ makes)
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP me))
                    (VP
                      (VB feel)
                      (ADJP (JJ comfortable))
                      (S
                        (VP
                          (VBG voting)
                          (PP (IN for) (NP (PRP him)))))
))
)
                (CC and)
                (VP
                  (VBZ gives)
                  (NP (PRP me))
                  (NP
                    (DT the)
                    (NN impression)
                    (SBAR
                      (IN that)
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP he))
                        (VP (VBZ is) (ADJP (JJ honest))))
)

    (. .))

It’s difficult for people to be open and honest about what they believe, especially if they think they’re going to face immediate criticism for it.

Just because you were wrong about something doesn't mean you can bring up things from my past that you know are deeply rooted emotional experiences, and use that as leverage.

I actually sort of said something like this to Justin before when I was inviting my friends over for a game of poker who have differing political opinions than him.

But I believe that there should not be legislation restricting healthcare in general, as there are already rules in place that prevents the unethical and unnecessary treatment of patients, especially minors, that have serious consequences such as losing ones medical license, which could disrupt their entire life.

Although healthcare providers, especially emergency healthcare providers have known this for a while based on their experiences, there is now the data to suggest that suicidality among transgender minors drastically increases where laws targeting transgender adults and minors are enacted.
(S (SBAR (IN Although) (S (NP (NP (NN healthcare) (NNS providers)) (, ,) (NP (ADVP (RB especially)) (NN emergency) (NN healthcare) (NNS providers))) (VP (VBP have) (VP (VBN known) (NP (DT this)) (PP (IN for) (NP (DT a) (NN while))) (PP (VBN based) (PP (IN on) (NP (PRP$ their) (NNS experiences)))))))) (, ,) (NP (EX there)) (VP (VBZ is) (ADVP (RB now)) (NP (NP (DT the) (NNS data)) (SBAR (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB suggest) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (NP (NN suicidality)) (PP (IN among) (NP (JJ transgender) (NNS minors)))) (ADVP (RB drastically)) (VP (VBZ increases) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB where)) (S (NP (NP (NNS laws)) (VP (VBG targeting) (NP (JJ transgender) (NNS adults) (CC and) (NNS minors)))) (VP (VBP are) (VP (VBN enacted)))))))))))))) (. .))(

Which is why I believe everyone should have access to this care if needed and we should trust doctors and parents to make the right decisions as it has worked pretty well previously and the affects of banning this care is far worst than the potential to regret transitioning.

(S (S (NP (RB Not) (NN everyone)) (VP (VBZ has) (NP (DT the) (JJ same) (NML (NML (NNS opportunities)) (CC or) (NML (NN support) (NNS systems)))))) (, ,) (CC and) (S (NP (NP (NNS things)) (PP (IN like) (SBAR (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB where)) (S (NP (PRP you)) (VP (VBP grow) (PRT (RB up))))) (CC or) (NP (JJ systemic) (NN inequality))))) (VP (MD can) (VP (VB make) (S (NP (NP (PRP it))) (ADJP (RB much) (JJR harder)) (SBAR (IN for) (S (NP (DT some) (NNS people)) (VP (TO to) (VP (VB succeed))))) (, ,) (ADVP (DT no) (RB matter) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB how) (JJ hard)) (S (NP (PRP they)) (VP (VBP try))))))))) (. .))(
  (S
    (S
      (NP (RB Not) (NN everyone))

    (CC and)

Tightening gun regulations doesn't mean taking away the guns people already own, it just means ensuring that the people who are buying guns understand how to store and use them safely, imposing waiting periods to prevent impulsive violence, and instituting background checks keep guns out of the hands of those who are statistically more likely to use them to cause harm.
(S (S (S (VP (VBG Tightening) (NP (NN gun) (NNS regulations)))) (VP (VBZ does) (RB n't) (VP (VB mean) (S (VP (VBG taking) (ADVP (RP away)) (NP (NP (DT the) (NNS guns)) (SBAR (S (NP (NNS people)) (ADVP (RB already)) (VP (VBP own)))))))))) (, ,) (S (NP (PRP it)) (ADVP (RB just)) (VP (VBZ means) (S (VP (VP (VBG ensuring) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (NP (DT the) (NNS people)) (SBAR (WHNP (WP who)) (S (VP (VBP are) (VP (VBG buying) (NP (NNS guns))))))) (VP (VBP understand) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB how)) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB store) (CC and) (VB use) (NP (PRP them)) (ADVP (RB safely)))))))))) (, ,) (VP (VBG imposing) (NP (VBG waiting) (NNS periods)) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB prevent) (NP (JJ impulsive) (NN violence)))))) (, ,) (CC and) (VP (S (VP (VBG instituting) (NP (NN background) (NNS checks)))) (VP (VBP keep) (NP (NNS guns)) (PP (IN out) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (DT the) (NNS hands)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (DT those)) (SBAR (WHNP (WP who)) (S (VP (VBP are) (ADJP (RB statistically) (RBR more) (JJ likely) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB use) (NP (PRP them)) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB cause) (NP (NN harm))))))))))))))))))))))) (. .))(
